gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 119, Pelicans 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Pelicans, 119-112. Jalen Williams (26 points, five rebounds), Josh Giddey (season-high 25 points, nine rebounds, four assists, five 3PM) and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (24 points, five rebounds, eight assists) lead the Thunder with 75 combined points in the victory, while Zion Williamson tallied 29 points, five rebounds and 10 assists for the Pelicans in the losing effort. OKC closed the game on a 12-0 run and improved to 50-21 on the season, while the Pelicans fell to 44-28.
